---
title: "Título principal del documento"
output: 
  officedown::rdocx_document:
    highlight: 'pygments'
    reference_docx: base.docx
    tables:
      style: Table
      layout: autofit
      width: 1.0
      caption:
        style: Table Caption
        pre: 'Table '
        sep: ': '
      conditional:
        first_row: true
        first_column: false
        last_row: false
        last_column: false
        no_hband: false
        no_vband: true
    plots:
      style: Normal
      align: center
      caption:
        style: Image Caption
        pre: 'Gráfico '
        sep: ': '
    lists:
      ol.style: null
      ul.style: null
    mapstyles:
      Normal: ['First Paragraph', 'Author', 'Date']
    reference_num: true
---
